page.title: 09FRIDAY'S ROUTINE MRS WALSHAW
page.content: Rise at 7.00,shower,dress,have coffee then prepare breakfast for 7.45 check school equipment.When family leave at 8.25 I wash up,make beds do the fire, vacuum the carpets,dust.I then sort and clean approx 10 dozen eggs,prepare lunch,usually fish and chips as the travelling wet fish salesman calls late morning.Some mending of clothes or weeding the garden before meal at 12.30.Wash up deliver eggs to customers in nearby town where I buy the week's meat,visit the chemist,Post Office and newsagents before returning home about 4p.m.I cook a meal for the children returning from school.At 6.15 transport daughter to gym club, put petrol in car,go shopping at Supermarket and chat with a friend.At 8.00 collect daughter, return home cook supper,then watch T.V. or listen to radio till bedtime about midnight.
